net.canarymod.hook.world

Class LiquidDestroyHook

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.canarymod.hook.Hook
      • net.canarymod.hook.CancelableHook
        • net.canarymod.hook.world.LiquidDestroyHook

  • public final class LiquidDestroyHook
extends CancelableHook
    Is called when a liquid is about to destroy something (crops, popping off torches etc)
    Author:
    Chris (damagefilter)

      • getBlock

        public Block getBlock()
        Get the block that would be destroyed by the liquid flow
        Returns:
        the Block

      • getLiquidType

        public BlockType getLiquidType()
        Returns the BlockType of the liquid. Always returns the Flowing variant.
        Returns:
        The liquid's BlockType

      • isForceDestroy

        public boolean isForceDestroy()
        Check if the block in question will be destroyed regardless of what it is.
        Returns:
        true if force destroy

      • setForceDestroy

        public void setForceDestroy(boolean forceDestroy)
        Set this to true to force the block to be destroyed. This will not work if the hook is canceled already!
        Parameters:
        forceDestroy - true for force destroy
